sentences.en: Banks should discourage indication of the expiry date of the credit in this manner.
sentences.cn: 银行应劝阻此种表明信用证到期日的做法.

sentences.en: Check the expiry date on your passport.
sentences.cn: 看一下你的护照什么时候到期。

sentences.en: Documents must be presented not later than the expiry date of the credit.
sentences.cn: 单据不得迟于信用证到期日提交.

sentences.en: Make a note of credit card numbers and check expiry dates.
sentences.cn: 记下信用卡卡号，核对有效期限。

sentences.en: Most common label items checked were expiry date, ingredients and nutritional value.
sentences.cn: 最经常检查的标签内容是有效期 、 组成成份和营养值.

sentences.en: Should be handled before the expiry of an extension or renewal procedures.
sentences.cn: 应当在期满前办理延期或换领手续.

sentences.en: Store at room temperature, use before the expiry date indicated on the lablel.
sentences.cn: 于室温下保存, 在标签上所注过期日期以前使用.

sentences.en: The advertisement will be automatically deleted after the expiry date.
sentences.cn: 期满后刊登产品的资料会自动被删除.

sentences.en: The certificate should be re - registered prior to the expiry date.
sentences.cn: 登记有效期为3年,有效期满前,应按有关规定办理再次登记.

sentences.en: The expiry of a driving licence, lease, credit card, contract, agreement, etc.
sentences.cn: 驾驶执照 、 租约 、 信用卡 、 合同 、 协议等的期满.

sentences.en: the expiry of a fixed-term contract
The United Mine Workers are not on strike today, despite the expiry of their contract at midnight.
sentences.cn: 联合矿业工会今天没有罢工，尽管他们的合同于午夜期满。

sentences.en: This film has passed its expiry date.
sentences.cn: 这个胶卷已过了有效期.

sentences.en: We are agreed the expiry date is March the 18 th.
What is the expiry date on your library book?
sentences.cn: 你从国书馆借的书哪一天到期?

sentences.en: What is the expiry date on your library novel?
sentences.cn: 你从国书馆借的小说书哪一天到期?

sentences.en: You have to apply for a renewal within six months before expiry.
sentences.cn: 你得在期满每六个月内申请继续注册.

trans.tran_en: The expiry of something such as a contract, deadline, or visa is the time that it comes to an end or stops being valid
